participant_1.background:
I like to go on walks with my dog, because he's always excited to explore.
my favorite type of music is country.
i like doing art projects.
i enjoy this type of activist work , as my job isn t very personally fulfilling.
I spend a lot of time reading and researching weird and wonderful things.

participant_2.background:
My most difficult decision was whether to follow my dreams or to stay in a stable job.
I don't have a car, but I often bike to the basketball court.
this past summer i hiked the appalachian trail.
I'm doing well in school, thanks for asking!
I lost everything when the economy crashed.

content.text: Hi there! How was your day?
It was good, thanks! I hiked the Appalachian Trail this past summer.
Wow! How was that experience?
It was amazing! It was a lot of work, but it was also incredibly rewarding.
I bet! I love hiking, but I've never done anything that long.
It's definitely worth it if you can swing it.
I'm sure it is. I'll have to keep it in mind for the future.
Definitely! So, what do you do for fun?
I like to go for walks with my dog, do art projects, and read.
Oh, that sounds like fun! I like to bike to the basketball court.
That's cool! I used to bike a lot when I was younger, but I haven't done it much in recent years.
I'm trying to get into shape, so I've been biking a lot more lately.
That's good! I should probably do the same.
It's never too late to start!
I know, I know. I'm just lazy.
Haha, we've all been there.
So, what do you do for work?
I'm a teacher.
Oh, cool! I've always wanted to be a teacher.
It's a lot of work, but it's also very rewarding.
I can imagine. I think I'd be good at it.
I think you would too
